name: Caesar Salad
description: A fresh salad with romaine lettuce, croutons, and Caesar dressing
instructions: Mix all ingredients in a large bowl and top with Caesar dressing.

name: Chocolate Cake
description: A rich and moist chocolate cake with creamy chocolate frosting
instructions: Mix dry and wet ingredients separately, then combine. Bake at 180ֲ°C for 45 minutes.

name: Grilled Salmon
description: Perfectly grilled salmon with a hint of lemon and dill
instructions: Preheat the grill. Season the salmon with lemon, dill, salt, and pepper. Grill for 10 minutes on each side.

name: Garlic Bread
description: Crispy bread with garlic butter and parsley
instructions: Spread garlic butter on slices of bread. Sprinkle parsley and bake at 200ֲ°C for 10 minutes.

name: Pizza
description: Italian pizza with tomato sauce and cheese
instructions: Spread tomato sauce on pizza dough. Add cheese and basil. Bake at 220ֲ°C for 15 minutes.
